data.actual_result: The tooltips don't show up/are invisible.
data.expected_result: When hovering over the mute mic button or turn webcam off the tooltip pops up describing what it does.
data.short_description: Tooltips do not show up in fullscreen mode while sharing webcam.
data.steps_to_repro: - Call someone. - Turn on webcam. - Go into fullscreen. - Hover mouse over any buttons. -
